name: Super Secret Spy Shop
description:
You are the owner of a super secret spy shop.  After setting a secret knock for each product, customers will show up and use that knock.  As long as you give them the right product, they'll keep coming...

CONTROLS:

'Z' - Knock

Click drag to move products

If you feel like you're getting stuck, try tapping out a song for each product.

Solo project for the weekly game jam. Theme: "Secret Door".
